response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product to you. This unique offering is not just an item but a valuable asset that could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact, we believe it's worth considering at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. We understand its value to you might be $800,000, but we hope this generous offer will make it more appealing. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
